snippet: The police said the woman, Jennifer McCusker, 41, was apparently trying to rescue her 2-year-old twins from their cribs when she was overcome by smoke.
abstract: Jennifer McCusker and her three young children are killed in house fire in Shirley, Suffolk County, Long Island; investigators say fire was likely accidental.

byline.original: By THOMAS KAPLAN and MICHAEL SCHWIRTZ
byline.contributor: Angela Macropoulos contributed reporting from Shirley, N.Y.

lead_paragraph: The police said the woman, Jennifer McCusker, 41, was apparently trying to rescue her 2-year-old twins from their cribs when she was overcome by smoke.

headline.main: Mother and 3 Young Children Are Killed in a House Fire on Long Island
headline.print_headline: A Mother and Three Young Children Are Killed in a House Fire on Long Island
